text: ya 'ayuha aladhin sddaqu allah warasulah waeamiluu bshreh, 'iinama alkhmr: wahi kl mskr yughatiy aleql, walmysr: wahu alqmar, wdhlk yashmal almrahnat wnhwha, mimaa fih eiwad min aljanbyn, wsdd ean dhikr allh, walansab: wahi alhijarat alty kan almushrikun yudhabihun eindaha tezymana lha, wama ynsb llebadt tqrbana 'ilyh, walazlam: wahi alqidah alty ystqsm biha alkufaar qabl al'iqdam ealaa alshy', 'aw al'ihjam enh, 'iina dhlk klh 'ithm min tazyin alshytan, fabtedu ean hadhih alatham, laealakum tfwzwn baljnt
